about_the_game:
The official artbook for The Star Named EOS, including the concept art and details of in-game art in exquisite detail.

This artbook is 74 pages long and includes background art, the photo album, puzzles, characters, and more.

Once the artbook has been downloaded, it can be found in the game's local files in PDF format.
detailed_description:
The official artbook for The Star Named EOS, including the concept art and details of in-game art in exquisite detail.

This artbook is 74 pages long and includes background art, the photo album, puzzles, characters, and more.

Once the artbook has been downloaded, it can be found in the game's local files in PDF format.
